posts.postText:
1. I am applying for NNJG Moderator.

2. I am currently 15, soon to turn 16 in a few months.

3. California.  Pacific Time Zone

4. [Elemental] ϟLightningϟ

5. STEAM_0:1:27506009 http://steamcommunity.com/id/crazyfire367/

6. REDACTED@REDACTED

7. I have been in NNJG TTT Jail and Flood servers for about 1 year now.  And acquainted with the standard rules of each game.

8. I can bring moderation into NNJG servers when there is no one to enforce the rules for NNJG.

9. I wish to enforce the NNJG rules in the servers and to keep sanity to our players.

10. I have lots of GMOD experience, a bit of TF2, CSS experience.

11. No, I have not owned any servers.  I usually moderate for one server. NuclearGaming [Sandbox]

12. Yes, I do own a microphone.

I  decline  this application because it's missing recommendations, Lightning isn't active, and I don't think he can handle the responsibility / I haven't seen him on enough to determine if he's responsible.

-Support  I have never seen him on any NNJG servers in a while now. I'm not admin or mod or anything so what I say probably won't count. Also I have played with him before and I personally don't think he's ready but then again who am I to say anything?

I have to agree with gash on this, I haven't seen you play in awhile now, aside from yesterday.

Plus you seem to rage a bit too often, and you can't do that as a mod or admin.

I'm going to have to disagree also.
Sorry :/
